verses.verse: And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Gater yourselves together <S%H622><s%> <S%H8734><s%>, that I may tell <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> you that which shall befall <S%H7122><s%> <S%H8799><s%> you in the last <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

Gater yourselves together <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8734><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, ye sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>; and hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> your father <S%H1><s%>.

Re'uven <S%H7205><s%>, thou art my firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, my might <S%H3581><s%>, and the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of my strength <S%H202><s%>, the excellency <S%H3499><s%> of dignity <S%H7613><s%>, and the excellency <S%H3499><s%> of power <S%H5794><s%>:

Unstable <S%H6349><s%> as water <S%H4325><s%>, thou shalt not excel <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8686><s%>; because thou wentest up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to thy father's <S%H1><s%> bed <S%H4904><s%>; then defiledst thou <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8765><s%> it: he went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to my couch <S%H3326><s%>.
SHim`on <S%H8095><s%> and Levi <S%H3878><s%> are brethren <S%H251><s%>; instruments <S%H3627><s%> of cruelty <S%H2555><s%> are in their habitations <S%H4380><s%>.

O my soul <S%H5315><s%>, come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not thou into their secret <S%H5475><s%>; unto their assembly <S%H6951><s%>, mine honour <S%H3519><s%>, be not thou united <S%H3161><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: for in their anger <S%H639><s%> they slew <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a man <S%H376><s%>, and in their selfwill <S%H7522><s%> they digged down <S%H6131><s%> <S%H8765><s%> a wall <S%H7794><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be their anger <S%H639><s%>, for it was fierce <S%H5794><s%>; and their wrath <S%H5678><s%>, for it was cruel <S%H7185><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: I will divide <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them in Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, and scatter <S%H6327><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, thou art he whom thy brethren <S%H251><s%> shall praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8686><s%>: thy hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be in the neck <S%H6203><s%> of thine enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; thy father's <S%H1><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> shall bow down <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> before thee.

Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> is a lion's <S%H738><s%> whelp <S%H1482><s%>: from the prey <S%H2964><s%>, my son <S%H1121><s%>, thou art gone up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: he stooped down <S%H3766><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, he couched <S%H7257><s%> <S%H8804><s%> as a lion <S%H738><s%>, and as an old lion <S%H3833><s%>; who shall rouse him up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8686><s%> ?

The sceptre <S%H7626><s%> shall not depart <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, nor a Torahgiver <S%H2710><s%> <S%H8781><s%> from between his feet <S%H7272><s%>, until <S%H3588><s%> Shiloh <S%H7886><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and unto him shall the gathering <S%H3349><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> be.

Binding <S%H631><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his foal <S%H5895><s%> unto the vine <S%H1612><s%>, and his ass's <S%H860><s%> colt <S%H1121><s%> unto the choice vine <S%H8321><s%>; he washed <S%H3526><s%> <S%H8765><s%> his garments <S%H3830><s%> in wine <S%H3196><s%>, and his clothes <S%H5497><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of grapes <S%H6025><s%>:
His eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall be red <S%H2447><s%> with wine <S%H3196><s%>, and his teeth <S%H8127><s%> white <S%H3836><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%>.

Z'vulun <S%H2074><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at the haven <S%H2348><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>; and he shall be for an haven <S%H2348><s%> of ships <S%H591><s%>; and his border <S%H3411><s%> shall be unto Zidon <S%H6721><s%>.
Yissakhar <S%H3485><s%> is a strong <S%H1634><s%> ass <S%H2543><s%> couching down <S%H7257><s%> <S%H8802><s%> between two burdens <S%H4942><s%>:

And he saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that rest <S%H4496><s%> was good <S%H2896><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> that it was pleasant <S%H5276><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; and bowed <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his shoulder <S%H7926><s%> to bear <S%H5445><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and became a servant <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto tribute <S%H4522><s%>.
Dan <S%H1835><s%> shall judge <S%H1777><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>, as one <S%H259><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

Dan <S%H1835><s%> shall be a serpent <S%H5175><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%>, an adder <S%H8207><s%> in the path <S%H734><s%>, that biteth <S%H5391><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the horse <S%H5483><s%> heels <S%H6119><s%>, so that his rider <S%H7392><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> backward <S%H268><s%>.
I have waited for <S%H6960><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thy salvation <S%H3444><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>.
Gad <S%H1410><s%>, a troop <S%H1416><s%> shall overcome <S%H1464><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him: but he shall overcome <S%H1464><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at the last <S%H6119><s%>.
Out of Asher <S%H836><s%> his bread <S%H3899><s%> shall be fat <S%H8082><s%>, and he shall yield <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> royal <S%H4428><s%> dainties <S%H4574><s%>.
Naftali <S%H5321><s%> is a hind <S%H355><s%> let loose <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8803><s%>: he giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> goodly <S%H8233><s%> words <S%H561><s%>.

Yosef <S%H3130><s%> is a fruitful <S%H6509><s%> <S%H8802><s%> bough <S%H1121><s%>, even a fruitful <S%H6509><s%> <S%H8802><s%> bough <S%H1121><s%> by a well <S%H5869><s%>; whose branches <S%H1323><s%> run <S%H6805><s%> <S%H8804><s%> over the wall <S%H7791><s%>:
The archers <S%H1167><s%> <S%H2671><s%> have sorely grieved him <S%H4843><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, and shot <S%H7232><s%> <S%H8804><s%> at him, and hated him <S%H7852><s%> <S%H8799><s%>:

But his bow <S%H7198><s%> abode <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in strength <S%H386><s%>, and the arms <S%H2220><s%> of his hands <S%H3027><s%> were made strong <S%H6339><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the mighty <S%H46><s%> 'Elohim of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>; (from thence is the shepherd <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, the stone <S%H68><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>:)

Havahn by the 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> of thy father <S%H1><s%>, who shall help <S%H5826><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee; and by <S%H854><s%> 'El SHaddai <S%H7706><s%>, who shall bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee with b'rakhot <S%H1293><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> above <S%H5920><s%>, b'rakhot <S%H1293><s%> of the deep <S%H8415><s%> that lieth <S%H7257><s%> <S%H8802><s%> under, b'rakhot <S%H1293><s%> of the breasts <S%H7699><s%>, and of the womb <S%H7356><s%>:

The b'rakhot <S%H1293><s%> of thy father <S%H1><s%> have prevailed <S%H1396><s%> <S%H8804><s%> above the b'rakhot <S%H1293><s%> of my progenitors <S%H2029><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto the utmost bound <S%H8379><s%> of the everlasting <S%H5769><s%> hills <S%H1389><s%>: they shall be on the head <S%H7218><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%>, and on the crown of the head <S%H6936><s%> of him that was separate <S%H5139><s%> from his brethren <S%H251><s%>.

Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> shall ravin <S%H2963><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as a wolf <S%H2061><s%>: in the morning <S%H1242><s%> he shall devour <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the prey <S%H5706><s%>, and at night <S%H6153><s%> he shall divide <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%>.

All these are the twelve <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8147><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: and this is it that their father <S%H1><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto them, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them; every <S%H834><s%> one <S%H376><s%> according to his b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%> he blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them.

And he charged <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, I am to be gathered <S%H622><s%> <S%H8737><s%> unto my people <S%H5971><s%>: bury <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me with my fathers <S%H1><s%> in the cave <S%H4631><s%> that is in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>,

In the cave <S%H4631><s%> that is in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Machpelah <S%H4375><s%>, which is before <S%H6440><s%> Mamre <S%H4471><s%>, in the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, which Avraham <S%H85><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with the field <S%H7704><s%> of Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the Hittite <S%H2850><s%> for a possession <S%H272><s%> of a buryingplace <S%H6913><s%>.

There they buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Avraham <S%H85><s%> and Sarah <S%H8283><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>; there they buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> and Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>; and there I buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%>.
The purchase <S%H4735><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> and of the cave <S%H4631><s%> that is therein was from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>.

And when Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> had made an end <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8762><s%> of commanding <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8763><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%>, he gathered up <S%H622><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his feet <S%H7272><s%> into the bed <S%H4296><s%>, and yielded up the ghost <S%H1478><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and was gathered <S%H622><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto his people <S%H5971><s%>.
